channel.title: US Elections 2024 Latest Updates: World News Headlines, Latest International News, World Breaking News - Times of India
channel.description: US Elections News: TOI brings the latest world news headlines, Current International breaking news world wide. In depth analysis and top news headlines world wide.
channel.copyright: Copyright:(C) Wed, 06 Nov 2024 23:13:09 IST Bennett Coleman & Co. Ltd, http://in.indiatimes.com/policyterms/1554651.cms

image.title: US Elections 2024 Latest Updates: World News Headlines, Latest International News, World Breaking News - Times of India

item.title: 2024 US Presidential election results live
US election highlights: Harris cancels speech as Trump inches closer to victory
item.description: Former President Donald Trump and vice president Kamala Harris faced off in a pivotal election that drew millions of voters. Trump secured early victories in Indiana and Kentucky, while Harris claimed Vermont. With polls closing in key states like Georgia, the nation awaits the outcome of this closely watched race.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: US election results 2024: Donald Trump, the imperial president
item.description: Donald Trump's projected second term promises a radical reshaping of American society, with a focus on mass deportation, the curtailing of reproductive rights, and the consolidation of presidential power. His plans, some drawn from the controversial Project 2025, include overhauling immigration enforcement, potentially detaining American citizens based on national origin, and promoting Christian nationalist policies.
item.dc:creator: Chidanand Rajghatta

item.title: Trump has won the US presidential polls, what happens now?
item.description: Donald Trump, in his second presidential transition, is prioritising loyalty in his appointments, including figures like Robert Kennedy Jr. and Elon Musk. This transition, managed by family and close allies, contrasts with his 2016 approach. Despite legal challenges delaying the 2020 transition, new legislation now ensures a smoother process for future transitions.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Did Kari Lake, Ted Cruz, AOC, Anna Paulina Luna win elections: Latest updates
item.description: ​Republican Ted Cruz, another closely watched senator, won a third term in the US Senate from Texas. He defeated US Rep Colin Allred. This was another election that pollsters predicted wrong as Ted Cruz was predicted to "lose for sure". ​The race tightened in the last few weeks as Allred spent millions of dollars on TV and digital ads criticizing Cruz for his support of the state's six-week abortion ban.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: US chooses Donald Trump: Climate change sceptic's return threatens global environmental progress
item.description: Donald Trump's return to the White House threatens global climate action. His pro-fossil fuel stance and potential withdrawal from the Paris Agreement could hinder emissions reduction efforts. While local initiatives may continue, the impact on international climate goals is concerning, particularly for vulnerable nations.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: 'Holy smokes! Literally nothing?' CNN anchor Jake Tapper's reaction on Election Night viral
item.description: ​CNN anchor Jake Tapper's shock at learning that Kamala Harris did not outperform Joe Biden's 2020 results in a single state on Election Night went viral. "Holy smokes! Literally nothing?" Jake Tapper said to CNN chief national correspondent John King who presented a grey map in front of him.“Literally not one county?” Tapper asked. And then he was shown the county-wise map in which Harris outperformed Biden by 3% in 58 counties.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Poll 'Nostradamus' Allan Lichtman to 'assess' last night's result as keys didn't work
item.description: "I want to thank all the loyal members, subscribers, and viewers of our live show. We will go on and are assessing last night’s results. Please tune in on Thursday at 9 PM Eastern for a discussion of what happened and what the future holds for America. @allanlichtmanyoutube," the historian posted.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Kamala Harris and major Dems fall silent after dismal result, Liz Cheney says 'like it or not...'
item.description: Kamala Harris has not spoken yet and neither conceded the election. Harris canceled her Election Night speech and all major Democrats and Dem social media handles fell silent. "All Americans are bound, whether we like the outcome or not, to accept the results of our elections," Liz Cheney posted Wednesday morning.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: 'Project 2025 was real the whole time' posts viral as Donald Trump set to return to White House
item.description: Project 2025 resurfaced as the talking point after Donald Trump claimed victory in an election which was thought closer than a coin toss. Project 2025 was a 900-page policy wish list from which Donald Trump distanced himself as it was at the center of a major controversy for its conservation vision. Right-wing think tank The Heritage Foundation drafted Project 2025 and it was unveiled in April 2023. The Kamala Harris campaign resisted Project 2025 while the Republicans disavowed it.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: 'I'm gonna f**k you up': Cardi B's meltdown on Insta live as Trump claims victory
item.description: Cardi B hurled abuses and broke down during an Instagram live when a fan asked her to be present at the Trump inauguration. “I swear to god I’m gonna f**k you up, get away from me,” she said during the video with more than 37,000 followers. “I’m sick of you! Burn you’re f**king hats motherf**ker. I’m really sad. I swear to god I’m really sad," she said.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Moo Deng's Trump's victory prediction in US election proves to be bang on
item.description: Moo Deng, a beloved pygmy hippo in Thailand, has become the latest animal oracle to weigh in on the 2024 US election. In a video that went viral, Moo Deng chose a watermelon carved with Donald Trump's name, sparking celebrations among Trump supporters and drawing comparisons to other animal predictions.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: When Donald Trump explained how his youngest son Barron grew 6 feet 9 inches tall
item.description: All the Trumps are tall including Melania but Barron's height is shocking and he clearly dominates the room he's in because of his height. His father did not miss a chance to speak about his height every time he appeared on a podcast as he also mentioned how smart Barron is and how he knows a lot about the internet, cryptocurrency etc.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Trump praises vice president-elect JD Vance and his 'beautiful wife' Usha Vance in victory speech
item.description: Donald Trump claimed victory in the 2024 US presidential election, with projections showing him defeating Democratic opponent Kamala Harris. Addressing supporters in Florida, he celebrated the win alongside his running mate, JD Vance, and Vance's wife, Usha Chilukuri Vance, who is set to become the first non-white US second lady.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: What happens to Donald Trump's criminal cases after he becomes President? Can he pardon himself?
item.description: Former US President Donald Trump is facing multiple criminal charges, including federal and state cases. A potential second term could impact these cases, potentially halting or dismissing some due to legal complexities and potential presidential immunity. The possibility of a self-pardon, while legally ambiguous, adds another layer of complexity to the situation.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: '12 hours of powers cuts daily': Karachi on streets over electricity, water supply cuts
item.description: Karachi residents protested against daily 12-hour power outages and resulting water shortages, claiming inaction by authorities despite numerous complaints. Adding to their woes, NEPRA announced an electricity rate hike, further fueling public anger. In solidarity, the Battagram Trade Union joined the protest, announcing a strike and refusal to pay bills until the power crisis is resolved.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: 'Powerful recommitment to great alliance': Netanyahu as Israel celebrates Trump's election win
item.description: Israel's right-wing government welcomed Donald Trump's US election win. The government sees it as positive for Israeli-American relations. Trump has pledged strong support for Israel, particularly in the current Middle East conflict. Israeli settler leaders also expressed hope for a more favorable stance from the US under a Trump administration.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Italy PM says Trump victory will strengthen country's bond with US
NATO's Rutte congratulates Trump on US election
US election results: Harris vs Trump – Who holds the edge in swing states?
item.description: Donald Trump is on the verge of winning the 2024 US presidential election, securing victories in key battleground states like Georgia and North Carolina. While Pennsylvania remains a crucial tipping point, Trump's lead in Michigan, Wisconsin, and Nevada suggests a potential return to the White House.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk
